short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Render full-page screenshots as a single image. No more scrolling and resizing. Just click and download.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take full-page screenshots of any website. Just click on the extension icon and select the type of capture.

After that, you can annotate the captured screenshot with text/arrows and download the image.

The extension supports PNG/JPEG image formats and a few capture types:
1. A full-page capture of the current page.
2. A full-page capture from the current position.
3. Capture the screenshot of the visible area only.

Privacy:
No ads and no network requests are made to any third-party services.
